Reviews.Title: Lumix FH24K - Thick For A Compact Camera, But Feature Packed with Great Image Quality
Reviews.Author: Mark "Technology, Music and Movies"
Reviews.Content: The Panasonic DMC-FH24K 16.1MP Digital Camera with 8x Wide Angle Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD is a very capable update to their compact ultra-zoom product family.  While it doesn't have the full HD video capabilities of the FX series, it does provide high resolution, large format photography and above average optical zoom.  It is not as svelte as the Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera, but it provides very good picture quality and a tremendous value in a compact camera.PROS:++ 28mm Leica DC Vario-Elmar lens provides great picture quality with wide-angle versatility++ Advertised 8x optical zoom scales up to 10x on my camera before switching to digital++ Extremely strong flash for a compact camera++ Some of the best face detection I have seen on any compact camera++ Handy 70 MB built-in memory provides emergency storage and a nice buffer for multiple pictures++ Convenient "E.Zoom" button for quickly zooming in and out++ Good size for taking it with you in your pocket or purse++ Metal front plate is attractive and durable++ Intuitive button controls including manual exposure adjustment++ Improved Intelligent Auto (iA) mode works quickly and enables motion detection and image stabilization++ Motion detection & IS can also be enabled manually for scene modes++ Two new iA functions: AF (Auto Focus) Tracking and Intelligent Exposure++ Venus VI Engine with noise reduction++ 2.7" TFT-LCD with multiple display settings++ Quick charging compact battery++ Image stabilization (MEGA O.I.S.) & shake detection++ Digital AV out connection with hinged cover++ Tripod mount hole is deep & on the left to allow easy access to your memory & battery++ 720p HD movie mode++ 28 scene modes for many situations (I am still learning these)++ A frequently used scene mode setting can be stored & accessed via "My Scene Mode"++ Great value given all the featuresCONS:-- While still compact, not as thin as other compacts such as the Canon Elph 300-- Zoom does not seem to work in HD video record mode (not yet sure if this is a product limitation or a defect with my specific camera)-- Inefficient picture deletion requires too many steps in review mode-- Video recording is accessed via a camera mode setting, which is counter intuitive-- No electronic or lens view-finder-- Many competing alternatives provide larger screens (3 inches and up) & touch control-- Flash may be too strong for some, blinding people when taking close up evening portraits-- Steep learning curve for mastery (for example, burst is in the Q menu instead of Mode)CONCLUSIONThis is a good camera with accessible controls and features.  The screen is not as big as those on other cameras, but it is clear and useful.  And this camera produces very good quality pictures.  That key strength makes this a good value for my needs.  Recommended.Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Skydiver
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  I could not be happier.  I have a great camera from Nikon that I love, but it is big and bulky and I rarely take it with me anywhere.  That defeats the purpose of having a camera.  So I decided to look for a small point and shoot and the reviews for this camera were astounding.  Mostly 4-5 stars and trust me, they were not wrong.  I have owned a few point and shoots and this one tops them all.  The intelligent auto is incredible.  I have played around with the settings and have take pictures adjusting the settings to what I thought was best and then took a picture allowing the intelligent auto to do the work...yup, the intelligent auto shots looked better.  The camera really does all the work.  If you are looking for a camera to carry around and take everywhere, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE BEST CAMERA I'VE EVER OWNED! It shoots VERY quickly, the images are very sharp, and the zoom is really good. Photos look just like a digital SLR camera! Definitely buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Jorge Goth Murtha "gothscl"
Reviews.Content: I have been told that Panasonic is trying to become the Apple of camera builders; it appears to be true because they are somewhat scarce at shops. I happened to find this one at Amazon and am very happy with it, it is perfect for traveling, compact and ligtweight and the point and shoot is enhanced by the fact that it takes no time at all to be ready for the next photo, apart from the fact that its features and quality are awsome.

Reviews.Title: Nice and takes beautiful pictures.
Reviews.Author: Pricky
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for the price i paid. It takes good and beautiful picture. It can record a video and has different important picture mode too.

Reviews.Title: right for the price
Reviews.Author: pennamely
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone.  She likes to hike and take nature photos. It suits her purposes fine.  The wide angle is great for landscape and the quick zoom also allows her to react to wild life.

Reviews.Title: Wow! Superb Picture Quality.
Reviews.Author: Mouffette
Reviews.Content: Superb low light pictures from Intelligent Automatic Focus setting without flash - looks like daylight! Colors beautiful and auto-focus excels even for close-ups with fine detail.  Easy to use, large screen.  Cannot say enough about the picture quality.  I now can relive my trip to my favorite part of France - serene, color-splashed Brittany. I was able to take incredible pix of Celtic engravings inside tombs without a flash.  Photos at dusk looked as clear as daylight. Vive la France et vive Panasonic!

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Fiona "Fiona"
Reviews.Content: I used this camera about 2 wks ago. If you're looking for a point and shoot camera then this is a nice place to start. My pictures were very bright and vibrant. With close up shots you can see people's pores (I kid you not). The night shots with the flash are clear which is great and the daytime ones are nice as well. I bought this camera because camera phone pics quite frankly suck, and I just needed a basic camera that took decent pics so I can have memories:) This camera fulfilled my needs. The only thing I don't like about the camera is the software it comes with. PHOTOfunSTUDIO is not fun!!!!. I enjoy manipulating photos then sending them to friends and family as a card, or for a laugh so I like software that is not only user friendly, but has a ton of options. PHOTOfunSTUDIO is neither. It's really bland. Good enough to get pics from the camera but thats about it. Thanks to the internet, you're not forced to use this software if you're like me. All in all, I give it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot for those that don't want to be a camera expert to get good pictures
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: This is what I have been looking for. Thanks to the reviews on Amazon I was able to narrow my search down to this camera series.Great point and shoot camera for people like myself who want excellent pics without becoming an expert or reading the manual.8X optical zoom is every good, except it is a bit jerky during adjustment.Image stabilization in the IA mode works well esp when taking pictures of my son who can't stay still.IA mode also switches to macro mode automatically when needed.Face tracking for auto-focus is great and will track more than one face or object.Low light pics are good without flash.Menu is not difficult to learn (without manual). Basic functions require just one or two steps (button pushes.With the timer and tripod mount I can take family pictures without dad usually missing. :)I have a good camera (12mp) with flash in my phone. But it has no timer, red eye reduction, macro mode and can't be mounted on a tripod.I bought this camera to sell some of my coin collection on Ebay. These are expensive coins and I have been able to get great pictures without a lot of trial and error. I've been getting top dollar for the coins because the pictures are clear and detail is excellent.Very pleased with this camera. It has a lot more features that I have not listed. I see no need to upgrade this camera for many years.You will need to buy a flash memory card. I strongly suggest you get a good quality high speed card. SDHC class 10. Check the reviews before you buy the card. With a fast card you can take good video as well as little or no delay between still shots without flash.This is not the touch screen model.Wait for this to go on sale. Put in your cart, save for later. Then when you check your cart Amazon tells you price changes since the last time you checked your cart. I have saved a lot of money doing this.Ships from and sold by Amazon

Reviews.Title: My Newest Toy
Reviews.Author: Gayle C.
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera. It's much smaller than the one I'm replacing. It takes fantastic pictures, and an unplanned bonus, for me, it the great video it takes. I love it, love it, love it, and would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: have bought two
Reviews.Author: Luke Hooten
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to go into great detail, but great camera for the money, good pics, kind of hard to learn how to use everything effectively, biggest issue is making sure you don't allow dirt into the lens, this especially happens in dusty environments.  I am on my second camera because of this issue, but for the money and the quality, I am very satisfied... Thus the fact I didn't buy a different type of camera.

Reviews.Title: Good so Far
Reviews.Author: eagles fly
Reviews.Content: This camera took wonderful pictures for christmas.  For the price it takes great pictures and I love the extended warranty.  This is the first time we try this brand camera usually buy the nikon coolpixs.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera when it worked, horrible customer support
Reviews.Author: Scott H.
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for our honeymoon.  Worked fine up until we got to the island, then the screen didn't work at all.  Thus, no honeymoon pictures from the good camera...Called Panasonic, which put me on hold for half an hour.  They told me to go to their website, follow the instructions, and print a form.  The website had no form or instructions.Called them again only to get put on hold for half an hour again.  This time I reached their India call center.  Keep in mind this was their tech service line.  The lady asked me what she could help me with.  I said "I have a broken camera."  Her response, "what would  you like ME to do about your broken camera?"  Ok, thanks for nothing.  What do you think I'm calling the tech service line for when I have a broken camera...maybe so you can tell me what I need to do to replace it!?  In the end, she simply gave me an address to mail the camera to.  No forms, no warranty info, nothing...I'll be surprised if I ever see that camera or my money again.Needless to say, if Panasonic values supporting it's customers by not helping them at all and outsourcing the "help" to India, I'm more than happy to "support" them by giving them bad reviews and never buying their products again.Hope you don't have issues if you buy this product...

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: miguel. B
Reviews.Content: i got the camera for 99 bucks, i mean, i found THE DEAL, amazing camera, effects, everything, and has work perfectly since day 1, highly recomended

Reviews.Title: Panasonic makes great digital cameras
Reviews.Author: biofly
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom for mother's day last year and man she fell in love with it.  She uses it all the time, pictures always come out great.

Reviews.Title: Defective shutter scratches camera lens!
Reviews.Author: AAyers
Reviews.Content: I've had the Lumix for a while and have been pleased with it until I recently noticed several fine vertical scratches on the lens (some are more like a dashed line ----). Each photograph, especially those where I've aimed into any kind of light source, have hazy white lines in the center of the photo. I couldn't figure out how I could have scratched the lens since the cover retracts automatically when it's not on. I am very careful with my camera and keep it in a lens case when being carried around. A little research turned this up: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lens-scratches/forum/Fx39Y385WF8RDUQ/Tx1ZBKB3Z7Z73R8/1?_encoding=UTF8&asin;=B001T0H0RG. Apparently lots of other people have had this this issue. The scratches are due to a defect in the camera shutter which scratches the lens each time it closes. When I listen closely I can hear it making contact with the glass. I called Panasonic and spoke to Otis, a supervisor in their Camera Repair dept. and, as expected, he told me that I'd have to return it for repair at a cost of $128. He said "defect or not, it's out of warranty". And that's that. I will not be returning it for repair at that cost, of course. Nor will I ever buy another Panasonic product.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Jack W. Morrison
Reviews.Content: We have been very satisfied with this camera. It is easy to use and the pictures are of high quality.

Reviews.Title: Noce Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife and she loves it.  Simple to use great pictures and no problems.  The perfect camera for someone who just want to take good pictures without a lot of setting to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for over a year and have not had any problems with it. The camera is very small for a 8 zoom camera and the zoom is very smooth. The picture quality on this camera is very good outside as I mainly use it in landscape areas. Inside pictures are good as well and portraits turn out very good. The only drawback with this camera is no zoom on video mode but I bought this for shooting pictures and it does that very well. For the money I do not think you can find a better camera - If you can find this on sale then I would say GET IT!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Robbi S.
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  I originally was looking at getting a Canon, but after seeing this camera at my local Best Buy I decided to go with it.It's really good quality for the price, I was quite surprised.  The design is awesome, its compact enough for easy travel but also takes quality shots with a good zoom.  I usually keep it with me for casual photo snapping but it can also be used for high quality shots as well.  I really how easy it is to upload photos too.  Very glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Everything i wanted
Reviews.Author: Delilah St. Clare
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera up during a Deal of the Day for $99. I haven't had a digital camera since 8 MP was new on the market.  I love this camera. The pictures are clear and the videos come out well. It has a ton of options for pictures. There isn't a button for movie mode. If you turn off the camera in movie mode, it will turn on in movie mode. Since the camera shoots in high def, there isn't that much room on memory cards for video. I have a 4gb card in mine and it shoots like 3 minutes of video tops. Thankfully memory cards are getting cheaper!  I would definitely buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality, especially in low light or flash situations
Reviews.Author: N. Woodward
Reviews.Content: I am returning this camera because the image quality just isn't very good, especially in low-light situations.  Every picture that used flash looks washed out and full of red-eye, even when using the "red-eye reducer" mode.  There are 28 different picture modes to chose from, including "Party" and "Baby," but choosing one over another doesn't result in any noticeable improvement (though admittedly, I have not tried the "fireworks" mode).My relative's compact Canon model took pictures of the same scenes and the images had better light balance, truer colors, and sharper lines.  My old camera (that broke before I got this one) was a Canon--so I'll be going back to that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl K. Yeager
Reviews.Content: I,m not a pro but I've owned lots of digital cameras over the years including several Panasonic. This is the best one I've ever had. Excellent picture quality, very good low light performance, excellent lens and zoom, even good battery life. I bought this for a low price of 139, it ouperforms cameras that I paid 500 for.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Doc S
Reviews.Content: It has all the features I want. It's easy to use and has great resolution. The price was very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Check out the reviews and ratings for the DMC-FH25 series
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While these reviews have been very helpful, I suggest you also read the many reviews for the Panasonic DMC-FH25 (Panasonic DMC-FH25K 16.1MP Digital Camera with 8x Wide Angle Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black).After trying unsuccessfully to find customer support for the DMC-FH24K on Panasonic's website, I was informed through their customer chat to look for the FH25 model - the FH24 is the same camera, lacking the AV cable that comes packaged with the FH25.Based on all this information and the generally favorable Amazon ratings and other web reviews, I did purchase the FH24 while it was on sale.  For the price I've been happy with this DMC-FH24, carrying it in my purse or pack for everyday photos when I don't want to carry a larger SLR camera.I have followed the advice of others to turn the flash off on this Panasonic and am amazed at the quality of the indoor photos using IA with no flash.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1-megapixel 1/2.33" CCD
8x optical/4x digital/32x total zoom
2.7" TFT-LCD display
High ISO sensitivity (up to 6400
720p HD movie mode
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic DMC-FH24K 16.1MP Digital Camera with 8x Wide Angle Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
